snippet: On Monday night, five Democrats running for mayor of New York City made their way to the College of Staten Island for a forum at which each pledged to help the island if elected.
lead_paragraph: On Monday night, five Democrats running for mayor of New York City made their way to the College of Staten Island for a forum at which each pledged to help the island if elected.

headline.seo: Alighting on Staten Island, Democratic Mayoral Hopefuls Make Their Appeals
headline.main: Democrats in Mayor’s Race Make Time for Staten Island
headline.print_headline: Democrats in Mayor’s Race Make Time for Staten Island
